text: Vincent James Naimoli (September 16, 1937 - August 25, 2019) was an American businessman and philanthropist. He was known as the first owner of the Major League Baseball team, the Tampa Bay Devil Rays.Chass, Murray. "BASEBALL: NOTEBOOK; Labor Board's Batting Average Could Favor the Players", The New York Times, March 12, 1995. Accessed December 23, 2007 He was born in Paterson, New Jersey."Vince Naimoli" sports.espn.go.com September 10, 2011 Naimoli was diagnosed with progressive supranuclear palsy in 2014.Former Tampa Bay Rays Owner Vince Naimoli Dead At 81 Years Old He died from problems caused by the disease on August 25, 2019 in St. Petersburg, Florida at the age of 81.Original Rays franchise owner Vince Naimoli dies at age 81 ==References== ==Other websites== * Short biography Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from progressive supranuclear palsy Category:Philanthropists from New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:Businesspeople from New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Florida Category:People from Paterson, New Jersey
title: Vince Naimoli
